pkgmetadata.longdescription: # QuickStart_Rhy```shellpip3 install quickstart-rhy # stable versionpip3 install git+https://github.com/Rhythmicc/quickstart-rhy.git -U # beta version but more features```| Key | Value || :--: | -------------------------------------------------- || ENV | **^Python 3.7** || FONT | **Cascadia Code / Meslo** || DOCS | <https://rhythmlian.cn/2020/02/14/QuickStart-Rhy/> |## Tab Complete1. fig ```shell npx @fig/publish-spec -p complete/fig/qs-<your language>.ts --name qs ```2. zsh ```shell mv _qs /path/in/$FPATH/ ```
